name: Auxi: A Time for Change
description:
Summary:
Auxi, a deity from the spirit world looks over the humanity, he notices their lack of evolution which concerns him. This leads him to act by imparting knowledge to avoid their extinction. As time goes on some humans abuse this new-found knowledge and once again find themselves at the brink of their own destruction. Auxi in an attempt to prove this is not his fault must play a role in key points of history to help humanity save itself. Auxi finds himself in the time of The Industrial revolution in a state of denial that humans are misusing his gift, this continues on to World War I where anger drives Auxi to find an answer to why humanity is failing. You play through each level, solving puzzles and hunting for knowledge scrolls to advance to the next level. Can Auxi save humanity?
